result.execSummary:
The defendant Troy D Nelson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Methamphetamine [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime, Second and Subsequent Offense], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: $290.60 fine/cost to be paid to the Clerk of Court's office. Monthly payment plan of $25.00 to begin on 6/1/16 and on the first of each month thereafter. Failure to pay will be warrant.

Must provide DNA sample and pay the $250.00 DNA surcharge to the Clerk of Court's Office. This cost is added to the payment plan of $25.00 per month beginning 6/1/16 and on the first of each month thereafter. Failure to pay will be warrant.
May not possess or use firearms or body armor.
Must successfully complete Drug Court Program.

timeConds.notes: Banked for use of agent if necessary.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Troy D Nelson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Troy D Nelson in court with attorney Dan Firkus.  Defendant Troy D Nelson in custody.  Daniel Patrick Steffen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  KJB- Clerk. 911AM Ct 1- Def plea of NC. CT accepts plea, finds G, enters JOC. 

SENTENCING: 5 yrs I/S prison: 3IC, 2ES. prob 3 yrs.  120 days banked for use of agent if nec, successfully complete DC program. $290.60 fine/cost. DNA sample & surcharge of $250. 25/mo PP beg 6/1/16. All costs to be put on the PP. cannot possess firearms. cannot vote. no sent credit. 927am adj.

Defendant Troy D Nelson in court with attorney Dan Firkus.  Defendant Troy D Nelson in custody.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 2:17 pm.  CT-there is a copy of an Information which was signed on 12/11 but has not been filed.  Firkus-def has been accepted into drug court, not ask for dismissal.  CT-timeliness for filing of Information is waived by counsel.  
Information filed with the court.  Firkus-NG plea.  JA to contact counsel for scheduling.  2:23 pm adj.

Defendant Troy D Nelson in court with attorney Dan Firkus.  Defendant Troy D Nelson in custody.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 9:36 am.   ADA-motion for bind over.  CT finds PC, def bound over.  CT modifies bond to Signature bond, also amended to NO Abusive contact with Katrina Mulroy.  CT amends on its face.  Bond cont as amended.  10:00 am adj.  Arraignment scheduled for January 15, 2016 at 11:45 am.
Report in support of probable cause for arrest. Request for criminal complaint
Not to have contact with: Katrina Mulroy.  Not to possess or use drugs or drug paraphernalia.

Defendant Troy D Nelson in court with attorney Dan Firkus.  Defendant Troy D Nelson in custody.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 1:24 pm.  Firkus-qualifies.  CT sets bond.  1:28 pm adj.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for December 10, 2015 at 09:30 am.
